title: Sorry for asking, but will Quinn be given some love season 10?
body:
Ik, annoying having people like me wanting their favorite champions to be pampered. 

But, genuinely, I think Quinn has run into the forgotten zone. She is a niece champion, good in certain situations, but never really useful. Some will disagree, I understand, it might just be me who lost the skills to play her right. Yet, I cannot help feeling bad for the champion.

I am not saying buff or rework her, I just wanted to talk about her. Let you all know that she exist in the game.

Thank you for reading.
